Library Version 12.1.6.1

Replication Manager Incoming Queue Size Limit
Prev  Chapter 9.  Upgrading Berkeley DB 12.1.6.0 applications to Berkeley DB 12.1.6.1  Next

Replication Manager Incoming Queue Size Limit

New Functions
New Event

Replication Manager now limits the amount of dynamic memory that its incoming message queue can consume and provides new functions to set and get this limit. There is also a new event that is fired when the incoming message queue first becomes full.

New Functions

  • DB_ENV->repmgr_set_incoming_queue_max()
  • DB_ENV->repmgr_get_incoming_queue_max()

New Event

  • DB_EVENT_REP_INQUEUE_FULL
